reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best dustpan and broom I have ever had!Most dustpans leave a little line of dust but not this one! I have purchased them for a number of my children and they agree that this set is the best they have ever used!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I bought a few of these for my Job and though they work good, the part the attaches to the dust pan to hook the broom isn't to sturdy and have mostly broken. But overall they are not a bad product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This was very easy to put together. I like to ease with which I can sweep and pick up the dirt, especially since I have a cat and a long-haired dog. I love that this has a little comb to sweep the broom bristles. And it’s saving me money on my swiffer refills. Now my swiffer is only picking up hair and dust! I hope I can get extra broom heads and I wish I had thought of that before. I will update this review if I can order additional Broomhead!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Difficult to easily manipulate
reviews.reviewText: I basically like the product but it has 1 design flaw that I find annoying when in use. When it is stored I store it so the dustpan opening is at 90 degrees to the floor with the opening pointing upward so nothing could spill out, and it makes it more convenient to store as it then lays on a flat surface. However, when I want to turn the dustpan so the opening is parallel to the surface of the floor it gets mechanically stuck - it doesn't rotate easily and I have to use my foot to flip it forward so it's usable to sweep dirt in . The same is true when rotating the dustpan so the opening is facing upward for storage - I have to use either my foot or bend forward so I can turn it with my hand to make it return it to its storage position which defeats the purchase of this dustpan design - it's supposed to eliminate the need to bend forward which is why I purchased it. I am 72 years old with a back problem - I try to avoid bending at the waist as much as possible to avoid pain. I'll be keeping it with the hope that with additional use it'll loosen up a bit to make it easier to rotate the dustpan portion. The broom is "OK".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and stores easily
reviews.reviewText: This set arrived packaged perfectly with no damage. I like that it is lightweight and easy to assemble. I also like how the broom and dust pan connects and can be stored together. The broom picks up lots of dust and it easily goes on the dust pan and not under it. Also, my favorite part about this set is the teeth on the dust pan. I love that it helps pull the hair out the broom so easily so you don’t have to touch it with your hands.This is definitely a must have to add to your cleaning supplies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars not really worth it
reviews.reviewText: The broom itself is all right but the dustpan is really hard to use. The trash doesn't go into the dustpan, it goes underneath. it often locks up when you don't want it to and when you leave it falls on its own. the dustpan always has a gap from the floor when it locks up and whatever dust you built up disappears under the dustpan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Long handled dustpan
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This just arrived a few minutes ago.I purchased it strictly for the dustpan; I already had a long handled dustpan and I will only have that style from now on- they are great.I've been wanting the type that "combs" the brooms so that's how I got here.It only took seconds to put together, it feels sturdy so far.The broom has a small head, and the bristles are floppy (I don't like that soft type of bristle) so I don't know how that would work BUT for me, the broom isn't that big of a deal because I like my current one but, I'll try it out.My *concern* is that the dustpan is slightly warped so it isn't fully making contact with the floor, allowing debris to slide underneath.Also, there is a smudge of some sort on the rubber end so I don't know if that is damage that is responsible for the pan's flaw or if that's just from the parts making contact during shipping.Anyway, if the pan's edge doesn't make contact with the floor, it defeats the purpose of the dustpan.I'm hoping that maybe it "settles"? Maybe the seller has some advice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You Need This For Your Cleaning Tools
reviews.reviewText: Item is as described & convenient! I love how easy it is to store & it makes sweeping a breeze!
